house_listing.house_description: Picture perfect redecorated unit overlooks condo pool and the chesapeake bay. Condo amenities include party room, exercise rooms, pool, beach, reserved parking and more. Condo fee includes cable, water, sewer, master flood and hazard insurance & maint. Of the bldg., Amenities & grounds.
house_listing.firm_name: The Prudential Decker Realty The Prudential Decker Realty
